Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, tailored specifically for your needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
